title: Annual report
context: ยง27G-5 Annual report. The committee shall submit an annual report to the governor and the legislature no later than twenty days prior to the convening of each regular session, on the operations of the portal. The annual report shall include the portal manager&rsquo;s annual financial reports. [L 2007, c 172, pt of ยง2; am L 2013, c 21, ยง2]
